Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2.Board

  • class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jo√£o on 30/09/2016. This class has information about the state of the game board and its pieces.

    • Method Detail

      • moveSelectedPiece

        void moveSelectedPiece(int x,
                       int y)
        Moves the selected piece to a location. Changes the board coordinates of the piece but not the graphics coordinates that are used to draw them. Also, removes selection.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate where to move the selected piece.
        y - Y coordinate where to move the selected piece.

      • deletePiecesToDelete

        boolean deletePiecesToDelete()
        This method removes from the board every piece that has toDelete == true;
        Returns:
        True if there were pieces to delete.

      • stick

        void stick()
        This method makes every piece have the float coordinates corresponding to their position in the board, so they will appear in the right place.

      • eat

        boolean eat()
        Eating involves 36 steps called 1 to 36, to ensure propagation to all 36 board places. There is an initial stage with index = 0; and a last stage with index = 37. Piece types that have different behaviour on the first or last stage should use the index. Each piece will have BoardPiece.eat called 38 times, with board for context and the index, that indicates the stage of the eating process.
